# email { #geneinfo.ontology.email }

```python
geneinfo.ontology.email(email_address)
```

Registers your email address for Entrez queries. Thay way, NCBI will contect you
before closeing your connection if you are making too many queries.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**email_address**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   your email address
